title: Three Men Out
description: A trio of mystery cases not to be missed by Nero Wolfe fans. In the first, questions about a poisoning come to an abrupt end--with a blunt instrument. Then Wolfe must decode the name of a killer in a message penciled by the victim. Finally, making an uncharacteristic foray to a World Series game, Wolfe meets murder again, when a rookie's struck out before he even gets to bat.
author: Rex Stout
